comment: Corrected spelling of 'hurrily' to 'hurriedly' in an answer. Good catch, despite other minor unnecessary punctuation changes.
CRITICAL: Deleted the entire HTML <ol> list from the question, removing essential content.
Hallucinated that the question was missing a question mark when it was already present. No changes made to the question.
Corrected subject-verb agreement ('includes' to 'include') and added an article. Valid grammar fix.
Claimed a question mark was missing, but it was already there. No changes made to the question text. Hallucination.
Hallucinated that the question was missing a question mark and that the answers had full stops. No changes were made. No damage.
